text: kaje'i allah yadi tomake phiriye anena tadera madhyera kono dalera nikata, tarapara tara yadi tomara anumati caya bera ha'oyara jan'ya tabe balo -- ''tomara kono krame'i amara sathe kakhano berute parabe na, ebam tomara amara sangi haye kakhano kono satrura birud'dhe larate parabe na. Nihsandeha tomara base thakate'i santasta chile prathama bare, ata'eba base thako pascate abasthanakaridera sange.â€™â€™
